tool_description: Detects and analyzes behavioral patterns in audience engagement, identifying peak activity times and content preferences.

time_zone.description: Time zone for temporal pattern analysis

pattern_confidence.description: Minimum confidence level for pattern detection (0.5-1.0)

error_messages: Insufficient engagement data: Minimum 100 engagement events required for pattern detection
Invalid pattern types: Specified pattern types are not supported
Invalid time zone: Time zone format must be valid (e.g., UTC, EST, PST)
Invalid confidence level: Pattern confidence must be between 0.5 and 1.0
No patterns detected: Engagement data does not contain detectable patterns at specified confidence level
usage: Provide engagement_data array and pattern_types to detect. Optionally specify time_zone and adjust pattern_confidence threshold for more or less strict pattern detection.
